thread.section_title: Hampton Inn San Francisco-Airport - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (South San Francisco, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel
thread.title_full: Great Hotel - Review of Hampton Inn San Francisco-Airport, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Danelle S
title: Great Hotel
text: Great staff, great rooms!! Will be back for sure! Hotel is located close to gas stations, food, soccer fields. Rooms were very nice and beds extremely comfortable. Breakfast had a number of different items. We had to leave at 6 a.m. and they had breakfast to go bags filled with a water, apple, muffin, and pastry bar. Was awesome just to grabbone and go.
